changes.short: Added error handling for negative inputs in factorial function.
changes.long: An if statement has been added at the beginning of the factorial function to check if the input number 'n' is negative. If it is, the function raises a ValueError to indicate that the factorial is not defined for negative numbers. This ensures the function's robustness by preventing invalid inputs.

changes.short: Added a main block to execute the factorial function.
changes.long: A main block has been added to the script to allow direct execution from the command line. It calculates and prints the factorial of 5 when the script is run as the main program. This addition is useful for testing or direct usage of the factorial function.
